ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I am a Full Stack Developer with experience in hybrid applications using Ionic, Angular, Python, and Node.js. I work on developing efficient and scalable solutions focused on user experience. I'm interested in emerging technologies such as artificial intelligence and automation, applying innovation strategically. I value clean code practices, solid architecture, and high-value deliveries. I'm constantly improving my skills and contributing to challenging and impactful projects.

INTERESTS.DESCRIPTION: I start the day with a strong coffee — essential to maintain focus and energy. Developing systems while listening to music has become more than a habit — it’s a passion. I value those moments of silence and deep focus in the code, where I truly feel at home. Outside of work, I enjoy playing video games with my son and spending quality time with my family.
